event CorporateAuthorizationAdded(address indexed employeeWallet, address indexed corporateWallet, string role, string department)
event CreditBalanceUpdated(address indexed wallet, uint256 previousBalance, uint256 newBalance)
event DomainWhitelistUpdated(address indexed wallet, string domain, bool whitelisted)
event EmailBindingUpdated(address indexed wallet, bytes32 indexed emailHash, bool added)
event EmailWalletRegistered(address indexed wallet, bytes32 indexed registrationId, bytes32 indexed primaryEmailHash, address parentWallet, uint256 timestamp)
event OwnershipTransferred(address indexed previousOwner, address indexed newOwner)
function corporateAuths(address) view returns (address corporateWallet, string employeeRole, string department, uint256 authorizedAt, bool isValid)
function deductCredits(address wallet, uint256 amount) returns (bool)

function getRegistration(address wallet) view returns (bytes32 registrationId, string primaryEmail, address parentCorporateWallet, bool autoProcessCC, uint256 registeredAt, bool isActive, uint256 creditBalance)
function isDomainWhitelisted(address wallet, string domain) view returns (bool)
function isEmailAuthorized(address wallet, string email) view returns (bool)

function registerEmailWallet(string primaryEmail, string[] additionalEmails, address parentCorporateWallet, bytes32[] authorizationTxs, string[] whitelistedDomains, bool autoProcessCC) payable returns (bytes32 registrationId)

function registrations(address) view returns (bytes32 registrationId, address walletAddress, string primaryEmail, address parentCorporateWallet, bool autoProcessCC, uint256 registeredAt, bool isActive, uint256 creditBalance)
function verifyEmailSignature(string email, bytes signature) view returns (bool)
